trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an error occurs during a cryptographic operation.
trans-unit.target: 当加密操作中发生错误时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: CryptographicException uses the HRESULT CORSEC_E_CRYPTO, unless an alternate error code is specified.
trans-unit.target: CryptographicException 使用 HRESULT CORSEC_E_CRYPTO，除非指定备用的错误代码。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of CryptographicException, see the constructor.
trans-unit.target: CryptographicException 的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException"></xref> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException"></xref>使用默认属性的类。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The localized error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|本地化的错误消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException"></xref> class with the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_HRESULT" name="HRESULT" href=""></xref> error code.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException"></xref>使用指定的类<xref uid="langword_csharp_HRESULT" name="HRESULT" href=""></xref>错误代码。

trans-unit.source: The CryptographicException constructor accepts a system `HRESULT` error code and sets the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property to a localized message that corresponds to the `HRESULT`.
trans-unit.target: CryptographicException 构造函数接受一个系统`HRESULT`错误代码和集<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>属性对应的本地化消息`HRESULT`。</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The localized error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|本地化的错误消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_HRESULT" name="HRESULT" href=""></xref> error code.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_HRESULT" name="HRESULT" href=""> </xref>错误代码。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException"></xref>与指定的错误消息的类。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|错误消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException"></xref>用序列化数据的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象过程中调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化的对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 有关源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用的类。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 前一个异常的直接结果应包含中的前一个异常的引用引发的异常，<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性返回相同的值传递到构造函数中，或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性不会提供给构造函数的内部异常值。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|内部异常引用。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|错误消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the `inner` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`inner`参数不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>中, 引发当前异常<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>处理内部异常的块。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException"></xref> class with a specified error message in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException"></xref>类指定的错误消息中指定的格式。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|错误消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The format used to output the error message.
trans-unit.target: 用于输出的错误消息的格式。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。
